Export yml object as a YAML knitr code chunk

Source: R/yml.R
asis_yaml_output.Rd

asis_yaml_output() exports a yml object as a YAML knitr code chunk instead of as an R object. Doing so adds code highlighting for YAML syntax.

asis_yaml_output(.yml, fences = TRUE)

Arguments

.yml

a yml object created by yml(), as_yml(), or returned by a yml_*() function

fences

Logical. Write fences ("---") before and after YAML?

See also

Other yml: bib2yml(), draw_yml_tree(), has_field(), read_json(), use_yml_defaults(), use_yml_file(), use_yml(), yml_author(), yml_blogdown_opts(), yml_bookdown_opts(), yml_citations(), yml_clean(), yml_distill_opts(), yml_latex_opts(), yml_output(), yml_pagedown_opts(), yml_params(), yml_pkgdown(), yml_reference(), yml_replace(), yml_resource_files(), yml_rsconnect_email(), yml_rticles_opts(), yml_runtime(), yml_site_opts(), yml_toc(), yml_vignette()
